entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
